summary: An ordinary man fights violence the only way he knows how - by killing one criminal at a time. Hero or villain? Justice or vengeance? You decide.
cast: Jamie Bamber|Lachy Hulme|Gary Abrahams|Sam Parsonson|Brendan Clearkin|Brooke Ryan|Ditch Davey|Louise Crawford|Guy Kable|Randall Berger|Isabella Woodlock|Barry Quin|Erin Dewar|Richard Moss|Chris Palframan|Fletcher Humphrys|Paul O'Brien|Chris Connelly|Bryce Hardy|Harry Pavlidis|Chloe Guymer|Ben Schumann|Daniel Lissing|Nicholas Colla|Rian Goodge|Brian Wenzel|Jason Buckley|Gregory Ross|Richard Hobson|Chris Weir|Colin MacPherson|Susanne Chapman|Jim Knobeloch|Richard Lambeth|Taro Ogata|Colin Masters|Bridget Borgobello|Olga Makeeva|Josh Price|Paul David-Goddard|Jarred Taylor|Terri Brabon|Kim Astill|David Lightfoot|James Schaw|Will Jones|Paul Allica|Chris Kerrison|Cate Cossimo|Lili Best|Evie Best|Graham Jahne|Patrick Constantinou|Robbie Clissold|Brendan Guerin|Daniel Solis|Paul Rochford|Siros Niaros|Chris Chalmers|Quinten Hann|Chad Whatley|Brad Geyer|Andy Poulter|David Cail|Hayden Leith|Serah Nathan|Adam Mate|Leanne Walker|Dylan Watson|Nathan Strauss|Alistair Cooke|Campbell Burnett|Robert Hiep|Ryan Lane|David Millar|Adam O'Donnell|Daniel Richmond|Michael Webster|Mark Wickham|Pierre Langenegger|Hayley Cooper|Luke Cunningham|Naomi Davis|Xavier Gouault|Dennys Ilic|Dawn Klingberg|Mim|Paul Ryan
title: John Doe: Vigilante
